author: Albert Einstein
title: Quote From Albert Einstein
text: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning..

comment.author: Kate Winslet
comment.text: Life is short, and it is here to be lived.

author: Walt Disney
title: Quote From Walt Disney
text: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Confucius
title: Quote From Confucius
text: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.

author: Winston Churchill
title: Quote From Winston Churchill
text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

author: Denzel Washington
title: Quote From Denzel Washington
text: Success? I don't know what that word means. I'm happy. But success, that goes back to what in somebody's eyes success means. For me, success is inner peace. That's a good day for me.

author: Albert Einstein
title: Quote From Albert Einstein, part 2
text: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
title: Quote From Eleanor Roosevelt
text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.

author: Thomas Edison
title: Quote From Thomas Edison
text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

author: Winston Churchill
title: Quote From Winston Churchill, part 2
text: If you're going through hell, keep going.

author: Neil Armstrong
title: Quote From Neil Armstrong
text: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.

author: Mark Twain
title: Quote From Mark Twain
text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

author: Thomas Jefferson
title: Quote From Thomas Jefferson
text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

author: Philippos
title: Quote From Philippos
text: You may only succeed if you desire succeeding; you may only fail if you do not mind failing.

author: Mother Teresa
title: Quote From Mother Teresa
text: One of the greatest diseases is to be nobody to anybody.

author: Pablo Picasso
title: Quote From Pablo Picasso
text: Everything you can imagine is real.
